trends: There has been one other sighting in Wagarville
There were no other sightings in Wagarville on or around January 31st 2006
divs: sighting detailsi was letting the dogs out and from the corner of my eye i saw what i thought was a falling star. it was bigger than normal. it was falling at a rapid speed like normal and then it stopped and hovered. it was falling from the northwest. shortly after about 2 minutes or so 2 airplanes came from the north up to the ufo\object and circled it. i ran inside to tell my husband we sat outside for at least 20 minutes watching the planes circle this object. we let the dogs back in and when i went back outside the object was gone and the planes.
